resources.string: What MyNotes Can Do For You

MyNotes is designed to be your ultimate personal organizer. It's a sleek, intuitive, and powerful app that lets you capture thoughts, ideas, to-do lists, and reminders with unparalleled ease. Whether you're brainstorming your next big project, jotting down a quick grocery list, or keeping track of important deadlines, MyNotes provides a clutter-free space for all your vital information. 

 With MyNotes, you can:
 - **Create and Edit:** Quickly write new notes or modify existing ones.
 - **Organize with Ease:** Keep all your notes in one central, accessible place.
 - **Simple Deletion:** Swipe to delete notes you no longer need.
 - **Modern UI:** Enjoy a clean, minimalist design that enhances readability and usability.
 - **Reliable Storage:** Your notes are saved locally, ensuring they're always available, even offline. 

 We believe that a clear mind starts with organized thoughts. MyNotes is crafted to help you achieve just that, allowing you to focus on what truly matters while we handle the organization. Start simplifying your life, one note at a time!

MyNotes is designed to be your simple, elegant, and efficient companion for jotting down thoughts, ideas, and reminders. This guide will walk you through the core features of the app to help you get started quickly and make the most out of your note-taking experience.
How to Create a New Note

Creating a new note is super easy!
 1. Look for the **floating "+" button** at the bottom right corner of the main screen.
 2. Tap on this button to open the "Add Note" screen.
 3. Enter a **Title** for your note in the first field.
 4. Write your **Description** (the main content of your note) in the larger field below.
 5. Once you're done, tap the **"Save" icon** (a floppy disk icon) in the top right corner of the toolbar to save your note.
How to Edit an Existing Note

Want to update a note you've already saved? No problem!
 1. From the main list of notes, simply **tap on the note** you wish to edit.
 2. This will open the "Edit Note" screen, pre-filled with your existing title and description.
 3. Make your desired changes to the **Title** or **Description**.
 4. Tap the **"Save" icon** in the toolbar to update the note with your changes.

If a note is no longer needed, you can easily remove it:
 1. On the main notes list, **swipe left or right** on the note you want to delete.
 2. A "Note deleted" message will briefly appear. 

 **Important:** If you have "Confirm Deletion" enabled in Settings, you'll see a confirmation dialog before the note is permanently removed. This helps prevent accidental deletions!

MyNotes offers a few ways to tailor the app to your preferences:
 1. Open the **Navigation Drawer** by tapping the **hamburger icon** (three horizontal lines) in the top left corner of the main screen.
 2. Tap on **"Settings"**.
 3. Here you can:
 - **App Theme:** Choose between Light, Dark, or System Default theme to match your device's settings or your personal preference.
 - **Sort Notes By:** Organize your notes by when they were last modified, when they were created, or alphabetically by title.
 - **Confirm Deletion:** Toggle this option to get a confirmation prompt before a note is deleted, providing an extra layer of safety.
